name: paranormally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to things that are impossible to explain by known natural forces or by science: It claims to be the world's most haunted and paranormally active location. She plays a paranormally gifted FBI agent.
More examplesFewer examplesCan astrologers or fortune tellers or any other paranormally gifted people really see into the future?He criticized the police for paying attention to paranormally obtained advice.The Countess's Tower is one of the most paranormally active areas in the castle.
